title: Health Data Visualization and Reporting
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to visualize patient health trends over time so that I can track health progression, identify early warning signs, and generate insights for better care strategies.

title: Integrated Calendar for Medication and Appointment Reminders
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want an integrated calendar for medication and appointment reminders so that I can efficiently manage my patients' care schedules and ensure timely interventions without overlaps.

title: Personalized Health Insights – Alerts for Potential Health Risks Based on Patterns
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive alerts based on patterns in my patients' health data so that I can anticipate deterioration and intervene early.

title: Emergency Response Features – Immediate Alerts to Caregivers During Critical Events
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive immediate alerts during critical events so that I can respond quickly to my patients' needs and provide timely interventions.

title: Automated Medication Reminders
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want automated reminders for my patients' medication schedules so that I can ensure they take their medications on time without disrupting their routines.

title: Access to Caregiver Training Resources
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want access to a library of training videos and guides so that I can independently explore system features and improve my ability to monitor and care for my patients.

title: Personalized Care Alerts
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive alerts based on patient-defined health criteria so that I can monitor their health progression effectively and respond to potential issues promptly.
